title: (a)Teapot And (b) Cover, 1959-155-7-a,b, 20th Century
markings: Impressed mark of Chinese characters and "Made in China".
description: (a): Cylindrical body with rounded shoulderr and short, straight neck. conical spout and ear-shaped handle. (b): Flat cover with slightly raised edge and deep flange. Bowl-shaped handle. Polychrome floer decoration on red stoneware.
